params.contentType: The MIME type of the content
params.name: A human-readable name for the content

returns.size: The size of the stored data in bytes

contentCount().notice: Get the total number of stored content items

getMetadata(bytes32).notice: Get metadata for content without returning the data

pin(bytes32).notice: Pin content to prevent garbage collection

store(bytes,string,string).notice: Store content and return its CID

unpin(bytes32).notice: Unpin content to allow garbage collection
